mapper.sql: SELECT t11.`BM`, t11.`BMID`, t11.`CHECKSTATUS`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t11.`CSRQ`, t1.`CZ`, t11.`FINISHED`, t1.`JDJSRQ`, case when SYSDATE > t1.`JDJSRQ` then 20 else 10 END AS `JDJSRQ_COLOR`, t1.`JDKSRQ`, t71.`SHORTNAME` AS `JDSHORTNAME`, t51.`ZZDZS` AS `JDZZDZS`, t11.`LXDH`, t11.`NL`, t11.`ZZID` AS `ORGID`, t11.`BMID` AS `ORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORMDUTYID`, t61.`ORMDUTYNAME`, t1.`ORMORGID`, t51.`ZZDZS` AS `ORMORGNAME`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORID`, t71.`SHORTNAME` AS `ORMORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`ORMPOSTID`, t81.`ORMPOSTNAME`, t1.`PCMYDJDMXID`, t1.`PCMYDJDMXNAME`, t11.`PCMYDMXTYPE`, t1.`PIMDISTIRBUTIONID`, t11.`PIMPERSONID`, t21.`PIMPERSONNAME`, case when SYSDATE > t1.`JDJSRQ` then 1 else 0 END AS `SFJDDQ`, t31.`SHORTNAME`, t11.`SXRQ`, trunc(months_between(t1.`JDJSRQ`,SYSDATE)) AS `SYYF`, case when SYSDATE > t1.`JDJSRQ` then 20 else 10 END AS `SYYF_COLOR`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t11.`YGBH`, t11.`YGW`, t11.`YRANK`, t11.`YZW`, t11.`ZJHM`, t11.`ZZ`, t41.`ZZDZS`, t11.`ZZID` FROM `T_PCMYDJDMX` t1 LEFT JOIN T_PCMYDMX t11 ON t1.PCMYDJDMXID = t11.PCMYDMXID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t21 ON t11.PIMPERSONID = t21.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_ORGSECTOR t31 ON t11.BMID = t31.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_ORG t41 ON t11.ZZID = t41.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_ORG t51 ON t1.ORMORGID = t51.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_ORMDUTY t61 ON t1.ORMDUTYID = t61.ORMDUTYID LEFT JOIN T_ORGSECTOR t71 ON t1.ORMORGSECTORID = t71.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_ORMPOST t81 ON t1.ORMPOSTID = t81.ORMPOSTID

SELECT t11.BM, t11.BMID, t11.CHECKSTATUS, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t11.CSRQ, t1.CZ, t11.FINISHED, t1.JDJSRQ, case when SYSDATE > t1.JDJSRQ then 20 else 10 END AS JDJSRQ_COLOR, t1.JDKSRQ, t71.SHORTNAME AS JDSHORTNAME, t51.ZZDZS AS JDZZDZS, t11.LXDH, t11.NL, t11.ZZID AS ORGID, t11.BMID AS ORGSECTORID, t1.ORMDUTYID, t61.ORMDUTYNAME, t1.ORMORGID, t51.ZZDZS AS ORMORGNAME, t1.ORMORGSECTORID, t71.SHORTNAME AS ORMORGSECTORNAME, t1.ORMPOSTID, t81.ORMPOSTNAME, t1.PCMYDJDMXID, t1.PCMYDJDMXNAME, t11.PCMYDMXTYPE, t1.PIMDISTIRBUTIONID, t11.PIMPERSONID, t21.PIMPERSONNAME, case when SYSDATE > t1.JDJSRQ then 1 else 0 END AS SFJDDQ, t31.SHORTNAME, t11.SXRQ, trunc(months_between(t1.JDJSRQ,SYSDATE)) AS SYYF, case when SYSDATE > t1.JDJSRQ then 20 else 10 END AS SYYF_COLOR, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t11.YGBH, t11.YGW, t11.YRANK, t11.YZW, t11.ZJHM, t11.ZZ, t41.ZZDZS, t11.ZZID FROM T_PCMYDJDMX t1 LEFT JOIN T_PCMYDMX t11 ON t1.PCMYDJDMXID = t11.PCMYDMXID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t21 ON t11.PIMPERSONID = t21.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t31 ON t11.BMID = t31.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t41 ON t11.ZZID = t41.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t51 ON t1.ORMORGID = t51.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_ORMDUTY t61 ON t1.ORMDUTYID = t61.ORMDUTYID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t71 ON t1.ORMORGSECTORID = t71.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_ORMPOST t81 ON t1.ORMPOSTID = t81.ORMPOSTID

SELECT t11.`BM`, t11.`BMID`, t11.`CHECKSTATUS`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t11.`CSRQ`, t1.`CZ`, t11.`FINISHED`, t1.`JDJSRQ`, case when SYSDATE > t1.`JDJSRQ` then 20 else 10 END AS `JDJSRQ_COLOR`, t1.`JDKSRQ`, t71.`SHORTNAME` AS `JDSHORTNAME`, t51.`ZZDZS` AS `JDZZDZS`, t11.`LXDH`, t11.`NL`, t11.`ZZID` AS `ORGID`, t11.`BMID` AS `ORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORMDUTYID`, t61.`ORMDUTYNAME`, t1.`ORMORGID`, t51.`ZZDZS` AS `ORMORGNAME`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORID`, t71.`SHORTNAME` AS `ORMORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`ORMPOSTID`, t81.`ORMPOSTNAME`, t1.`PCMYDJDMXID`, t1.`PCMYDJDMXNAME`, t11.`PCMYDMXTYPE`, t1.`PIMDISTIRBUTIONID`, t11.`PIMPERSONID`, t21.`PIMPERSONNAME`, case when SYSDATE > t1.`JDJSRQ` then 1 else 0 END AS `SFJDDQ`, t31.`SHORTNAME`, t11.`SXRQ`, trunc(months_between(t1.`JDJSRQ`,SYSDATE)) AS `SYYF`, case when SYSDATE > t1.`JDJSRQ` then 20 else 10 END AS `SYYF_COLOR`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t11.`YGBH`, t11.`YGW`, t11.`YRANK`, t11.`YZW`, t11.`ZJHM`, t11.`ZZ`, t41.`ZZDZS`, t11.`ZZID` FROM `T_PCMYDJDMX` t1 LEFT JOIN T_PCMYDMX t11 ON t1.PCMYDJDMXID = t11.PCMYDMXID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t21 ON t11.PIMPERSONID = t21.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_ORGSECTOR t31 ON t11.BMID = t31.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_ORG t41 ON t11.ZZID = t41.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_ORG t51 ON t1.ORMORGID = t51.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_ORMDUTY t61 ON t1.ORMDUTYID = t61.ORMDUTYID LEFT JOIN T_ORGSECTOR t71 ON t1.ORMORGSECTORID = t71.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_ORMPOST t81 ON t1.ORMPOSTID = t81.ORMPOSTID WHERE ( t11.`FINISHED` = 0 )

SELECT t11.BM, t11.BMID, t11.CHECKSTATUS, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t11.CSRQ, t1.CZ, t11.FINISHED, t1.JDJSRQ, case when SYSDATE > t1.JDJSRQ then 20 else 10 END AS JDJSRQ_COLOR, t1.JDKSRQ, t71.SHORTNAME AS JDSHORTNAME, t51.ZZDZS AS JDZZDZS, t11.LXDH, t11.NL, t11.ZZID AS ORGID, t11.BMID AS ORGSECTORID, t1.ORMDUTYID, t61.ORMDUTYNAME, t1.ORMORGID, t51.ZZDZS AS ORMORGNAME, t1.ORMORGSECTORID, t71.SHORTNAME AS ORMORGSECTORNAME, t1.ORMPOSTID, t81.ORMPOSTNAME, t1.PCMYDJDMXID, t1.PCMYDJDMXNAME, t11.PCMYDMXTYPE, t1.PIMDISTIRBUTIONID, t11.PIMPERSONID, t21.PIMPERSONNAME, case when SYSDATE > t1.JDJSRQ then 1 else 0 END AS SFJDDQ, t31.SHORTNAME, t11.SXRQ, trunc(months_between(t1.JDJSRQ,SYSDATE)) AS SYYF, case when SYSDATE > t1.JDJSRQ then 20 else 10 END AS SYYF_COLOR, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t11.YGBH, t11.YGW, t11.YRANK, t11.YZW, t11.ZJHM, t11.ZZ, t41.ZZDZS, t11.ZZID FROM T_PCMYDJDMX t1 LEFT JOIN T_PCMYDMX t11 ON t1.PCMYDJDMXID = t11.PCMYDMXID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t21 ON t11.PIMPERSONID = t21.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t31 ON t11.BMID = t31.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t41 ON t11.ZZID = t41.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t51 ON t1.ORMORGID = t51.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_ORMDUTY t61 ON t1.ORMDUTYID = t61.ORMDUTYID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t71 ON t1.ORMORGSECTORID = t71.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_ORMPOST t81 ON t1.ORMPOSTID = t81.ORMPOSTID WHERE ( t11.FINISHED = 0 )

SELECT t11.`BM`, t11.`BMID`, t11.`CHECKSTATUS`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t11.`CSRQ`, t1.`CZ`, t11.`FINISHED`, t1.`JDJSRQ`, case when SYSDATE > t1.`JDJSRQ` then 20 else 10 END AS `JDJSRQ_COLOR`, t1.`JDKSRQ`, t71.`SHORTNAME` AS `JDSHORTNAME`, t51.`ZZDZS` AS `JDZZDZS`, t11.`LXDH`, t11.`NL`, t11.`ZZID` AS `ORGID`, t11.`BMID` AS `ORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORMDUTYID`, t61.`ORMDUTYNAME`, t1.`ORMORGID`, t51.`ZZDZS` AS `ORMORGNAME`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORID`, t71.`SHORTNAME` AS `ORMORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`ORMPOSTID`, t81.`ORMPOSTNAME`, t1.`PCMYDJDMXID`, t1.`PCMYDJDMXNAME`, t11.`PCMYDMXTYPE`, t1.`PIMDISTIRBUTIONID`, t11.`PIMPERSONID`, t21.`PIMPERSONNAME`, case when SYSDATE > t1.`JDJSRQ` then 1 else 0 END AS `SFJDDQ`, t31.`SHORTNAME`, t11.`SXRQ`, trunc(months_between(t1.`JDJSRQ`,SYSDATE)) AS `SYYF`, case when SYSDATE > t1.`JDJSRQ` then 20 else 10 END AS `SYYF_COLOR`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t11.`YGBH`, t11.`YGW`, t11.`YRANK`, t11.`YZW`, t11.`ZJHM`, t11.`ZZ`, t41.`ZZDZS`, t11.`ZZID` FROM `T_PCMYDJDMX` t1 LEFT JOIN T_PCMYDMX t11 ON t1.PCMYDJDMXID = t11.PCMYDMXID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t21 ON t11.PIMPERSONID = t21.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_ORGSECTOR t31 ON t11.BMID = t31.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_ORG t41 ON t11.ZZID = t41.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_ORG t51 ON t1.ORMORGID = t51.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_ORMDUTY t61 ON t1.ORMDUTYID = t61.ORMDUTYID LEFT JOIN T_ORGSECTOR t71 ON t1.ORMORGSECTORID = t71.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_ORMPOST t81 ON t1.ORMPOSTID = t81.ORMPOSTID WHERE ( t11.`FINISHED` = 1 )

SELECT t11.BM, t11.BMID, t11.CHECKSTATUS, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t11.CSRQ, t1.CZ, t11.FINISHED, t1.JDJSRQ, case when SYSDATE > t1.JDJSRQ then 20 else 10 END AS JDJSRQ_COLOR, t1.JDKSRQ, t71.SHORTNAME AS JDSHORTNAME, t51.ZZDZS AS JDZZDZS, t11.LXDH, t11.NL, t11.ZZID AS ORGID, t11.BMID AS ORGSECTORID, t1.ORMDUTYID, t61.ORMDUTYNAME, t1.ORMORGID, t51.ZZDZS AS ORMORGNAME, t1.ORMORGSECTORID, t71.SHORTNAME AS ORMORGSECTORNAME, t1.ORMPOSTID, t81.ORMPOSTNAME, t1.PCMYDJDMXID, t1.PCMYDJDMXNAME, t11.PCMYDMXTYPE, t1.PIMDISTIRBUTIONID, t11.PIMPERSONID, t21.PIMPERSONNAME, case when SYSDATE > t1.JDJSRQ then 1 else 0 END AS SFJDDQ, t31.SHORTNAME, t11.SXRQ, trunc(months_between(t1.JDJSRQ,SYSDATE)) AS SYYF, case when SYSDATE > t1.JDJSRQ then 20 else 10 END AS SYYF_COLOR, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t11.YGBH, t11.YGW, t11.YRANK, t11.YZW, t11.ZJHM, t11.ZZ, t41.ZZDZS, t11.ZZID FROM T_PCMYDJDMX t1 LEFT JOIN T_PCMYDMX t11 ON t1.PCMYDJDMXID = t11.PCMYDMXID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t21 ON t11.PIMPERSONID = t21.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t31 ON t11.BMID = t31.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t41 ON t11.ZZID = t41.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t51 ON t1.ORMORGID = t51.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_ORMDUTY t61 ON t1.ORMDUTYID = t61.ORMDUTYID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t71 ON t1.ORMORGSECTORID = t71.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_ORMPOST t81 ON t1.ORMPOSTID = t81.ORMPOSTID WHERE ( t11.FINISHED = 1 )
